projects.title: CNJM Money Market Fund Calculator
projects.description: A financial tool for calculating money market fund returns.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed an intuitive Svelte-based calculator for estimating money market fund earnings. The application provides real-time calculations and visualizes investment growth over time.

projects.title: Corrupt Zone
projects.description: A Flask-based web app for tracking corruption cases and incidents.
projects.detailedDescription: Created a robust corruption tracking platform using Flask. The application allows users to report and browse corruption cases while ensuring anonymity and security.

projects.title: Luxury Footwear E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Scalable e-commerce solution for high-end footwear.
projects.detailedDescription: Architected a high-performance e-commerce platform specializing in luxury footwear. Implemented a custom CMS for product management and integrated secure payment gateways.

projects.title: House Help App (In Progress)
projects.detailedDescription: Building a mobile-first platform connecting households with verified domestic helpers. Features include real-time tracking, background checks, and automated scheduling.

projects.title: CNJM Constructions
projects.description: A Svelte-powered website for a construction company.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed a sleek and modern website for a construction company using Svelte. The platform highlights completed projects, services, and client testimonials.

projects.title: CNJM Photography
projects.description: A photography portfolio website built with Svelte.
projects.detailedDescription: Designed and developed a visually stunning portfolio website for photographers. The platform allows for high-resolution image galleries and an elegant UI to enhance visual storytelling.
